snippet: Mitt Romney and Rick Santorum held primary night rallies and spoke to their supporters. In his victory speech, Mr. Romney focused on President Obama, while Mr. Santorum promised a “strong second half.”
lead_paragraph: Mitt Romney and Rick Santorum held primary night rallies and spoke to their supporters. In his victory speech, Mr. Romney focused on President Obama, while Mr. Santorum promised a “strong second half.”

headline.main: Romney and Santorum: Wisconsin Primary Speeches
